articles.author: Vincent Ni
articles.title: Many Americans say the U.S. is not a moral leader but want it to be: NPR/Ipsos poll - NPR
articles.description: Commissioned by NPR in partnership with Ipsos, the poll also highlights sharp partisan divides on key foreign policy issues.
articles.content: Americans from across the political spectrum say the U.S. should be the moral leader of the world, but far fewer believe that it actually is today than previously, according to a new NPR/Ipsos poll.… [+4433 chars]

articles.title: Greenlanders express fear and indignation as Trump eyes territory - BBC
articles.description: Greenlanders tell the BBC they have no interest in becoming American as the White House restates its desire for annexation.
articles.content:
